introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: GetNanoPro (hereinafter referred to as "we") understands the importance of your personal information. We will protect your personal information and privacy security in accordance with laws and regulations.
introduction.content2: This Privacy Policy applies to your access and use of our services through the GetNanoPro website, mobile applications, or other means.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect the following types of information:

providedInfo.title: Information You Provide
items: Account registration information: username, email, password
Profile information: avatar, nickname, bio
Payment information: order details, transaction records
Feedback: comments, suggestions, or complaints you provide to us

automaticInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Device information: device model, operating system, browser type
Log information: IP address, access time, pages visited
Cookies and similar technologies
Usage data: feature usage, number of images generated

userContent.title: User Generated Content
userContent.description: Images you generate using our services, prompts you input, and other content.

dataUsage.title: Use of Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your transactions and requests
Send you service notifications and updates
Analyze service usage to optimize user experience
Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and illegal activities
Comply with legal requirements
Train and improve our AI models

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
With service providers (such as cloud storage, payment processing)
To comply with legal requirements or respond to legal processes
To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of others
In the event of corporate mergers or reorganizations, information may be transferred as an asset

dataStorage.title: Information Storage
dataStorage.location: Storage location: Your information may be stored on servers within or outside China.
dataStorage.duration: Storage duration: We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes of collection, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
dataStorage.security: Security measures: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption and access controls.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
items: Remember your login status and preferences
Analyze website traffic and usage
Provide personalized content and advertising
cookies.note: You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the use of certain features.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: Under applicable law, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access: View the personal information we hold about you
Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
Right to restrict processing: Limit our processing of your information
Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured format
Right to object: Object to our processing of your information
Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent you previously provided

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our services may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites and recommend reviewing their privacy policies.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. If we discover that we have collected personal information from children, we will delete it immediately.

policyUpdates.title: Privacy Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated policy will be posted on this page with the last updated date noted. In the event of significant changes, we will notify you via email or website notification.
